interface.name: ModelChannelMixer
interface.comment: Used to process input audio from voices mix.
Is used to trigger that this mixer is not be used and it should fade out.
interface.javadoc:
ModelChannelMixer is used to process channel voice mix output before going to master output.
It can be used to:
  • Implement non-voice oriented instruments.
  • Add insert effect to instruments; for example distortion effect.

    • Warning! Classes that implements ModelChannelMixer must be thread-safe. Karl Helgason
